revised_title: Atheroma and Arterial Wall Shear: The Role of Wall Shear in Atherosclerosis
tldr: This study investigates the relationship between atheroma development and arterial wall shear, focusing on early atheroma stages. The authors found that high wall shear can help prevent the progression of atherosclerosis. They also developed a theoretical model for shear-dependent mass transport of cholesterol, which may play a role in atherogenesis.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Vascular Biology
